## EthersKumo.getFrontendStatus() method

Check whether an address is registered as a Kumo frontend, and what its kickback rate is.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFrontendStatus(asset: string, address: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<FrontendStatus>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  asset | string |  |
|  address | string | Address to check. |
|  overrides | [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) |  |

Promise&lt;[FrontendStatus](./lib-base.frontendstatus.md)<!-- -->&gt;
